[API] Getting a token

You can get a security token.

HTTP request syntax (URI) 

GET https://ipAddress:port/v1/security/tokens

The token is passed back in the header.

Request structure

Not applicable.

Response structure

{
  "username": ""
}

Parameter

Type

Description

username String User name for logging in.

Return codes

Status code

HTTP name

Description

200 OK Success
401 Unauthorized The operation is not authorized.
403 Forbidden The server failed to authenticate the request.
404 Not found The specified resource does not exist.
